code: |
  function sinh (arg) {
    //  discuss at: http://phpjs.org/functions/sinh/
    // original by: Onno Marsman
    //   example 1: sinh(-0.9834330348825909);
    //   returns 1: -1.1497971402636502

    return (Math.exp(arg) - Math.exp(-arg)) / 2
  }
